basic.description:
Upon agreement with a qualified instructor, this course may be taken by an upper-year student in Linguistics to explore a specific area or methodology. Regular meetings, directed readings.
LEARNING HOURS    120 (12I;108P)
basic.subject: LING
basic.title: Directed Readings in Linguistics

extra.enrollment_requirement: Prerequisites   (6.0 units at the 300-level or above in LING) and (a GPA of 3.5) and permission of the Department.
